verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: As a mother stills her child, Thou canst hush the ocean wild; Boisterous waves obey Thy will When thou say'st to them, "Be still!" Wondrous Sov'reign of the sea, Jesus, Savior, pilot me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When at last I near the shore, And the fearful breakers roar 'Twixt me and the peaceful rest, Then, while leaning on Thy breast, May I hear Thee say to me, "Fear not, I will pilot thee."
